MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH5 postcode area of Sandycroft, affecting customers on Moor Lane, Chester Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:31PM. Our engineers have established that there is an underground cable fault and that repairs will be complex so we are connecting generators to restore power, and this should happen by 6:00PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:45PM on 8th March 2021
